| rev1 = Allmusic rev1Score = 
}} 'Play' is the self-titled debut album by Swedish girl group Play, released on
25 June 2002. It was their debut album in the United States, while the album Us
Against the World, which included five additional songs, was released in other
countries. The album spent six weeks on the ''Billboard'' 200, peaking at #85 on
17 August 2002, and on 24 March 2003 the album was
certified Gold by the RIAA. The songs "I'm Gonna Make
You Love Me (Feat. Chris Trousdale)" and "Us Against the World" had been
frequently played on Radio Disney in 2002 to late 2003.
